controls

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • controls.Time

  • public final class Time
extends java.lang.Object
    Time class holds information about simulated application time. It also provides useful methods for work with simulated time and constructing time tables.
    Author:
    Michal Rein, Ondřej Motyčka

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) long appTime
      Represents current simulated time in seconds.
      (package private) int delayCounter
      Delay counter.
      (package private) int speedRatio
      Speed ratio, increasing this ration increases pace of time.
      (package private) StatusBarTime timeStatusBarHandle
      Handle for status bar.

    • Field Detail

      • appTime

        long appTime
        Represents current simulated time in seconds.

      • speedRatio

        int speedRatio
        Speed ratio, increasing this ration increases pace of time.

      • delayCounter

        int delayCounter
        Delay counter. Delay is affected by speed ratio.

      • timeStatusBarHandle

        StatusBarTime timeStatusBarHandle
        Handle for status bar.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Time

        public Time(int start,
            StatusBarTime timeStatusBar)
        Constructor of Time class. Sets current time to starting time given by parameter start.
        Parameters:
        start - Starting value of time.
        timeStatusBar - Status bar handle.

    • Method Detail

      • updateTime

        public void updateTime()
        Simulate pass of one second in simulated world. After trespassing value of 86400 (which stands for 24 hours), time must be reset. Status bar is also informed about time change and new value is displayed.

      • getAppTime

        public long getAppTime()
        Get current simulated time.
        Returns:
        Simulated time (in seconds).

      • resetDelayCounter

        public void resetDelayCounter()
        Reset of delay counter.

      • incrementDelayCounter

        public void incrementDelayCounter()
        Incrementation of delay counter.

      • getDelayCounter

        public int getDelayCounter()
        Get delay counter.
        Returns:
        Delay counter value.

      • getSpeedRatio

        public int getSpeedRatio()
        Get speed ratio.
        Returns:
        Speed ratio value.

      • setSpeedRation

        public void setSpeedRation(int newSpeed)
        Set new speed ratio.
        Parameters:
        newSpeed - New value of speed ratio.

      • convertTimeToString

        public static java.lang.String convertTimeToString(long time)
        Method converts time given in seconds into HH:MM:SS format.
        Parameters:
        time - Time which has to be converted into readable format.
        Returns:
        Time in HH:MM:SS format.

      • convertStringToTime

        public static long convertStringToTime(java.lang.String timeString)
        Method converts time given in HH:MM:SS format into seconds.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Time in seconds.

      • calculateTimeDifference

        public java.lang.String calculateTimeDifference(long time)
        Calculate time difference between current time and given time.
        Parameters:
        time - Time is seconds.
        Returns:
        Difference of current time and time given by parameter.

      • getCongestionConstant

        public static int getCongestionConstant(Street street)
        Return congestion level constant. It is used for calculation of estimated time arrival.
        Parameters:
        street - Street from which we need to get congestion constant.
        Returns:
        Congestion constant of given street.
